title.rendered: Gender and its intersectionality: guidelines for programming and engagement in governance

content.rendered:
With the aim to integrate gender in all areas of the Foundation’s work, the principle of intersectionality has been identified as a key programme strategy. This document provides an understanding of intersectionality and its application to the Foundation’s focus in supporting people’s participation in governance.

Download the gender intersectionality guidelines 2019

excerpt.rendered: This document provides an understanding of intersectionality and its application to the Foundation’s focus in supporting people’s participation in governance.
